summary: Frontend testing of Roles, Team Members, Reports, Clients, Orders, and Dashboard pages - ALL FEATURES WORKING CORRECTLY

issues: Console warning: HTML hydration error - <span> cannot be child of <tbody>. This is caused by Emergent's visual editor injecting span elements - NOT an application code bug. Non-blocking.

context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features verified working. The app is stable and ready for use.

dashboard_page.kpi_cards: Shows Total Revenue ($15,000), Open Orders (2), New Clients (1), Avg Order Value ($5,000)
dashboard_page.quick_actions: New Deal, New Order, Pipeline, Reports buttons visible and functional
dashboard_page.sales_trend_chart: Monthly chart with New Clients and Repeat Clients data
dashboard_page.pipeline_breakdown: Shows Proposals Sent, Negotiation, Awaiting Approval, Closed Won, Lost/Stale
dashboard_page.recent_deals_table: Displays deals with Client, Product, Amount, Status, Date columns

roles_page.each_role_shows: Name, member count, description, permissions badges

reports_page.kpis: Total Revenue ($3,868), Total Orders (3), Active Clients (5), Conversion Rate (20.0%)
reports_page.top_products_table: Visible with Rank, Product, Total Orders, Unique Clients, Performance columns

clients_page.stats: Total Clients (5), Active Clients (5/100%), Lifetime Revenue ($16,105), Avg Reorder Rate (2.4x/year)

orders_page.stats: Total Orders (3), Open Orders (2), Delivered (1), Total Value ($3,867.50)
orders_page.expandable_rows: PASS - Clicking order row expands to show line items

bugs_fixed_by_main_agent.roles_page_empty: VERIFIED FIXED - Now shows 4 roles correctly
bugs_fixed_by_main_agent.reports_nan_revenue: VERIFIED FIXED - Changed o.amount to o.total in Reports.jsx line 54
